Html: This seems like it should be simple, but I'm stumped.  So I have a data grid on my form.  When I click into a cell it creates a new row.  Great, that's exactly what I want to happen.  When I tab from the last column of the second to last row, into the next row, it does not create a new row as I'd expect.  Not a big deal until I get to the last column of the last row.  Pressing tab does nothing.  The expected behavior is that it will create a new row and tab into it.  I'm a bit confused on how to implement this.  Any tips?
